author: Nancy A. Youssef
title: Pentagon Blames Islamic State For Blast That Killed U.S. and U.K. Troops
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”U.S. military officials said they believe the Islamic State extremist group was behind the explosive attack that killed an American and British soldier last week in the Syrian city of Manbij.
The military was less clear about whether the Islamic State members allegedly behind the attack were previously entrenched in Manbij or had traveled there from another part of Syria still under their control, including areas within the city of Idlib, one official said.
